plot: A concert film which captures Bono and the U2 boys live in Boston June 6, 2001. The film is an interactive experience which lets the viewer dictate different perspectives and angles of viewing. The band performs 19 of their best tunes, including &"Sunday Bloody Sunday&" and &"Beautiful Day.'   Written by  Ciaran O'Shea
title: U2: Elevation 2001 Live from Boston
